name: Vegan Strawberry Cheesecake Tarts for 2. Glutenfree Recipe
description: Easy Strawberry Cheesecake Tarts for 2 with gluten-free Coconut oat crust. Vegan Gluten-free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: a few drops of vanilla extract
a pinch of cinnamon or other spices (optional)
1/4 cup cashews (soaked for an hour or more)
1/2 tsp vinegar (I use apple cider vinegar)

recipeInstructions.text: Crust: Mix everything under crust in a bowl. Add enough maple so the dough can stay together. Press in the tart pans.
recipeInstructions.name: Crust: Mix everything under crust in a bowl. Add enough maple so the dough can stay together. Press in the tart pans.

recipeInstructions.text: Filling: Blend everything under filling. Taste and try to not eat it all. Adjust the salt, sweet and tang (lemon juice) if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Filling: Blend everything under filling. Taste and try to not eat it all. Adjust the salt, sweet and tang (lemon juice) if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill the crust wit the filling. Tap to eliminate air pockets. Place the tart pans on a baking sheet and bake at pre-heated 350 degrees F for 30 minutes, then reduce temperature to 325 degrees F / 160ºc and bake for another 15 minutes or until the center is not liquid.
recipeInstructions.name: Fill the crust wit the filling. Tap to eliminate air pockets. Place the tart pans on a baking sheet and bake at pre-heated 350 degrees F for 30 minutes, then reduce temperature to 325 degrees F / 160ºc and bake for another 15 minutes or until the center is not liquid.

recipeInstructions.text: Chill for atleast an hour. Drizzle melted chocolate and serve with fresh chopped strawberries
recipeInstructions.name: Chill for atleast an hour. Drizzle melted chocolate and serve with fresh chopped strawberries
